AUTH.SUBTITLE: Keep your family group and tasks organized
AUTH.RECOVER_PASSWORD_INSTRUCTIONS: We will send you a link with instructions to reset your password

TODAY.TITLE: Today
TODAY.NO_TASKS: You don't have tasks yet, go to settings and create some.

TASKS.TITLE: Tasks
TASKS.SUBTITLE: Keep your group organized by creating tasks. Keper will be responsible for notifying and showing users their assigned tasks

USERS.TITLE: Users
USERS.SUBTITLE: Keep your group organized by adding users responsible for tasks
USERS.USER_WAS_FOUND: We found a user with this email. If this is not the user you are trying to add then make sure the email is correct

FORM.EMAIL_P_ALT: What is the user's email address?
FORM.EMAIL_E: Email must be a valid email address
FORM.NAME: Name
FORM.PASSWORD_E: Password must be at least 6 characters
FORM.PHONE_P: What is the user's phone number?
FORM.TASK_NAME_P: What is the name of this task?
FORM.TASK_SCHEDULE_P: At what time should this task occur?

TOAST.SIGN_IN_ERROR: Could not sign in with this credentials, please try again.
TOAST.SIGN_UP_ERROR: Something went wrong, please try again.
TOAST.CREATE_PROFILE_ERROR: It was not possible to complete your profile. To complete your information complete the form in your profile.
TOAST.UNABLE_TO_SAVE_NAME: Something went wrong and your name wasn't saved. Please try again.
TOAST.UNABLE_TO_SAVE_EMAIL: Something went wrong and your email wasn't saved. Please try again.
TOAST.PASSWORD_RECOVER_EMAIL: We have sent you an email with instructions to reset your password.
TOAST.LIST_TASKS_ERROR: Something went wrong, and we can't fetch tasks. Please try again.
TOAST.LIST_USERS_ERROR: Something went wrong, and we can't fetch users. Please try again.
TOAST.UNABLE_TO_SAVE: Something went wrong and the information could not be saved. Please try again.

GROUP.TITLE: Groups
GROUP.SUBTITLE: A group is where users and tasks coexists. For example a group could be you home with your family or your office with your coworkers.
